--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
>
> "The ve=
nom has been neutralized, but the damage to your foot will remain
The effec=
ts of the venom quickly shrug themselves out of Tucsons' system and in no t=
ime, he becomes much more alert and slides off the bench as if nothing had =
happened to him, all except for a little nagging pain from the foot injury =
which he found he could actually tolerate.  He bares weight on it, and find=
s that it poses no problem for him mobility wise.

"Ahh, not as bad as I th=
ought it would be, just a little sore.  Kenzo this will have to wait, becau=
se I don't know how much time Rodimus has until whatever it is that was don=
e to him, comes to the point where it can't be reversed.  And besides that,=
 the Matrix of Leadership could be in danger of being tainted.  I don't wan=
t that to happen.  Most of all, I would rather NOT lose my leader to corrup=
tion."

He tests his transformation sequence, going from robot to SUV mode =
and then back to robot form within a matter of moments.

"I can transform w=
ithout delays or hesitations.  I may not be a hundred percent but I am full=
y functional and as long as I can function, I'd rather not waste any more t=
ime."

He grabs his cross bow and puts it over his shoulder.  Nothing was g=
oing to hold Tucson back, not even a whole army of Unicron's minions. Rodim=
us was in trouble and he knew that an Autobot never deserted his comrades, =
especially his leader.

" All right, I'm ready.  Kenzo, I need a one way ri=
de over a space bridge to where Hydras is keeping Rodimus.  I know this is =
against your best wishes and I should really be in the CR chamber, but my i=
njuries can wait.  Rodimus needs help, and so far, I may be the only Autobo=
t close enough to help him.  Ughh, if Kup ever found out I was doing this h=
e'd render me insane."



> until you can use a CR chamber.  I don't have t=
he repair tools to fix it
> myself." he replied.
> 
> Kenzo turned and look=
ed at active CR chamber.  It was in hibernate mode and
> had a backup power=
 supply, but they wouldn't be able to use the other CR
> chambers without t=
urning the power back on.
> 
> *
> Meanwhile....*
> 
> The team turns a cor=
ner and follows a sign reading "Power Plant".  The
> corridor is littered w=
ith debris and in places is difficult to pass
> through.  Up ahead they can=
 see a large sealed door.

ry to bargain with Hydras to restore him back

.

 No one

s his fist down on the bench, as it cracks beneath his power driven

t.
